comments:

2) In Plug-ins tab, delesect all plugins
3) Click Run

This is a valid use case because I want to install plugins that I am building somewhere else (not PDE).  I have the plugins in jar form, and it is inconvenient to put them in the workspace.
although we will fix the NPE, it's not a valid use case, since you need at least org.eclipse.osgi (the framework) to launch.
That's fair :-).  I guess then we just need a more descriptive error.
launching with no plug-ins now fails with an error telling you that org.eclipse.osgi is missing from the launch configuration.
